name: スーパーモンキーボール ウキウキパーティー大集合
summary: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Blitz is a platform game, the seventh title in the Super Monkey Ball series, following Super Monkey Ball Adventure. It was released as a launch title for the Wii system on November 19, 2006 in North America. An HD remaster is set to release on October 29, 2019 for the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One, and in late 2019 for Microsoft Windows.
